name: West Fallen
description:
This is a alpha release, please give me feedback!

West Fallen is a tactical fantasy turn based RPG inspired by Final Fantasy Tactics.  You play an elite squad commander caught in an epic power struggle between imperial forces and rebel outlaws.   Is the Emperor doing what's best to keep the empire safe, or a power hungry tyrant?  Shape the future of the world with your choices.

Westfallen has a substantial job system with over 30 job classes with over 300 abilities.  Choose from close quarters melee fighters, powerful spell casters, archers, healers, and more.  Should you focus your squad on powerful buffs? ranged attacks? or powerful hand to hand attacks?  Try out various tactics to get the edge on strong enemies.

Targeting both windows and mac platforms.
